com.cba.inmemorycache

Interface MemoryCache

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LRUMemoryCache

    public interface MemoryCache
    This provides the methods a MemoryCache needs to access.
    Author:
    Van Hai Ho

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cleanup()
      This instructs the memory cache to remove all objects in the cache that TTL is expired.
      int freeElements(int numberToFree)
      This instructs the memory cache to remove the numberToFree according to its eviction policy.
      CacheElement get(Serializable key)
      Gets an item from the cache
      int getSize()
      Gets the number of elements contained in the memory cache.
      void put(Object key, Object val)
      Puts an object into the cache.
      boolean remove(Serializable key)
      Removes an item from the cache.
      void removeAll()
      Removes all cached items from the cache.
      void update(CacheElement ce)
      Puts an item to the cache.

    • Method Detail

      • getSize

        int getSize()
        Gets the number of elements contained in the memory cache.
        Returns:
        Element count

      • remove

        boolean remove(Serializable key)
        throws IOException
        Removes an item from the cache.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the item to be removed.
        Returns:
        true if the item with the specified key is removed from the cache.
        Throws:
        IOException - Error when remove the item from the cache.

      • removeAll

        void removeAll()
        throws IOException
        Removes all cached items from the cache.
        Throws:
        IOException - Error when remove the items from the cache.

      • freeElements

        int freeElements(int numberToFree)
          throws IOException
        This instructs the memory cache to remove the numberToFree according to its eviction policy. For example, the LRUMemoryCache will remove the numberToFree least recently used items.
        Parameters:
        numberToFree - the number of items to be removed.
        Returns:
        the number that were removed. if you ask to free 5, but there are only 3, you will get 3.
        Throws:
        IOException - Error when removing the items from the cache.

      • cleanup

        void cleanup()
      throws IOException
        This instructs the memory cache to remove all objects in the cache that TTL is expired.
        Throws:
        IOException - Error when cleaning up the cache.

      • get

        CacheElement get(Serializable key)
          throws IOException
        Gets an item from the cache
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the item to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        The item to be retrieved.
        Throws:
        IOException - Error when retrieving the item.

      • update

        void update(CacheElement ce)
     throws IOException
        Puts an item to the cache.
        Parameters:
        ce - The item to be updated in the cache.
        Throws:
        IOException - Error when updating the cache.

      • put

        void put(Object key,
         Object val)
  throws IOException
        Puts an object into the cache.

        If the key or the value is null, and IOException is thrown.

        Parameters:
        key - The key of the object to be put into cache.
        val - The object to be put into cache.
        Throws:
        IOException - Error when adding object to the cache.
